nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党指导思想之一，由习近平创立，于2017年中共十九大写入党章，并于2018年写入中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, founded by Xi Jinping, written into the Party Constitution at the 19th Party Congress in 2017, and into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. Officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，习近平当选为中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: At this meeting, Xi Jinping was elected as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The highest-ranking position in the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 此次大会将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中国共产党章程》。
description.en: This congress wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）

description.zh-cn: 该宪法修正案将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: This constitutional amendment wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，以毛泽东的名字命名。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，以邓小平的名字命名。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，习近平的前两任领导人之一。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, one of Xi Jinping's two predecessors.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，习近平的前任。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Xi Jinping's immediate predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的常设领导机构。
description.en: The standing leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育

zh-cn: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央政治局决定在全党开展的政治学习运动。
description.en: A political study campaign launched throughout the party by the decision of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府负责教育事务的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for educational affairs in the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省省长，曾撰文高度评价习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想。
description.en: Governor of Gansu Province, who wrote an article highly praising Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

description.zh-cn: 香港记者、香港中文大学历史系兼任教授，曾对习近平思想作出评价。
description.en: Hong Kong journalist and adjunct professor in the History Department of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, who has commented on Xi Jinping Thought.

description.zh-cn: 上海政法学院国际事务与公共管理学院副教授，曾对习近平思想作出评价。
description.en: Associate professor at the School of International Affairs and Public Administration, Shanghai University of Political Science and Law, who has commented on Xi Jinping Thought.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平被官方认定为习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者，该思想是在他2012年11月当选中共中央总书记后逐步形成的。
description.en: Xi Jinping is officially recognized as the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, which was gradually formed after he was elected General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee in November 2012.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

position.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 会议选举习近平为中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: The meeting elected Xi Jinping as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 自2012年11月15日起担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Has served as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China since November 15, 2012.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 大会通过了关于《中国共产党章程（修正案）》的决议，将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入党章，并将其确立为党的指导思想。
description.en: The congress passed a resolution on the "Constitution of the Communist Party of China (Amendment)," writing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Party Constitution and establishing it as a guiding ideology of the party.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 大会通过《中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）》，将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: The congress passed the "Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China (2018)," writing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育

description.zh-cn: 主持会议决定，从2023年4月开始，在全党开展学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育。
description.en: Chaired a meeting and decided to launch a thematic education campaign to study and implement Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era throughout the party, starting in April 2023.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 宣布香港初中公民与社会发展科将于2024年9月新学年全面推行，并要求教师向中三学生讲解习近平思想。
description.en: Announced that the Citizenship and Social Development subject for junior secondary schools in Hong Kong will be fully implemented in the new school year starting September 2024, requiring teachers to explain Xi Jinping Thought to Form 3 students.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 在《学习时报》上撰文，称习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想是“一本读不完的大书”、“一座取不尽的富矿”、“一盏指航向的明灯”、“一支蓄满力的利箭”。
description.en: Wrote in the Study Times, describing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as "a great book that can never be finished," "a rich mine that can never be exhausted," "a beacon that guides the way," and "a powerful arrow ready to be shot."

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 评价认为，习近平思想的14条方略没有任何理论创新，将其写入党章的本意在于树立绝对政治权威，便于排除异己，为其长期执政做铺垫。
description.en: Commented that the 14 strategies of Xi Jinping Thought have no theoretical innovation, and that writing it into the party constitution is intended to establish absolute political authority, facilitate the elimination of dissidents, and pave the way for his long-term rule.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 评价认为，习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想达不到毛泽东思想和邓小平理论无所不包的程度，其原创内容不多。
description.en: Commented that Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era does not reach the all-encompassing level of Mao Zedong Thought and Deng Xiaoping Theory, and that its original content is not extensive.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 批准在中国社会科学院成立10家习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心之一。
description.en: Approved the establishment of one of the 10 research centers for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.
